resources.string: Does not meet minimum requirements (not 8–32 characters, does not contain at least 1 letter and 1 number, or is the word \"password\").
Meets minimum requirements but does not include a variation of uppercase letters, lower case letters, numbers, and special characters.
Meets minimum requirements and combines upper case letters, lower case letters, numbers, and special characters.
Does not meet minimum requirements (not 6–16 characters, looks like an account number, or uses spaces or the following characters: (\`)(\')(\")(\\))
Meets minimum requirements but does not include a variation of letters, numbers, and special characters.
Meets minimum requirements and combines a variation of letters, numbers, and special characters.
